body:
## Steps to reproduce the issue
```
spack install --test=all cppunit
```

### Information on system

```
~/key4hep-spack/environments/key4hep-release (release *)$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2301-b2fd7cb23b
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-haswell
* **Concretizer:** clingo

```

## Error log
```

394 make[3]: Entering directory '/tmp/ubuntu/spack-stage/spack-stage-cppunit-1.14.0-24mo55jojkawpr2q4fafiio7rxsr    drkf/spack-src/examples/hierarchy'

400 make  check-TESTS
401 make[3]: Entering directory '/tmp/ubuntu/spack-stage/spack-stage-cppunit-1.14.0-24mo55jojkawpr2q4fafiio7rxsr    drkf/spack-src/examples/hierarchy'
402 make[4]: Entering directory '/tmp/ubuntu/spack-stage/spack-stage-cppunit-1.14.0-24mo55jojkawpr2q4fafiio7rxsr    drkf/spack-src/examples/hierarchy'
```

title: Test issue: cppunit
